description:
'''Colin Patrick Harper''' (born August 21, 1981), better known by his stage name '''Collie Buddz''', is a Bermudian
[[reggae]] singer. He signed with [[Columbia Records]] to release his [[Collie Buddz (album)|self-titled debut studio album]] (2006), which entered the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] and contained the singles "Come Down" and "Mamacita".
